headline: AppLovin (APP) Reaffirmed as Top Pick by Citi Ahead of Q2 Earnings
summary: Applovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the Best Non-Mega Cap NASDAQ Stocks to Buy Right Now. Applovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) shares jumped on Monday after Citi reiterated the stock as a top pick heading into the company’s second-quarter earnings report, scheduled for August 6. The firm reaffirmed its Buy rating and maintained a $600 price target, citing confidence […]

headline: AppLovin Stock (APP): Analysts Expect Strong Q2 and More Upside Ahead
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight Today. On July 14, Citi analyst Jason Bazinet reiterated a “Buy” rating on the stock with a $600.00 price target. headline: AppLovin: There Is Still More Upside Left
summary: AppLovin's transformation into an AI-powered ad platform with its Axon engine has driven exceptional revenue growth and profitability. See why APP stock is a Buy.
